commit.message:
decl2.c (cxx_decode_option): Simplify -fhandle-exceptions test by using positive_option.


	* decl2.c (cxx_decode_option): Simplify -fhandle-exceptions
	test by using positive_option.  Make whitespace consistent.

From-SVN: r55616
